name: Super DeGooper Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover
description: Super DeGooper Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover quickly and easily strips off multiple layers of oil, latex and epoxy paint; oil and latex varnish;polyurethane; moisture cure; lacquer and shellac. Its gel formula is ideal for exterior use and vertical surfaces. It does not require any afterwash or neutralizing. Safe to use on fine furniture - willnot raise wood grain, harm most glue joints or veneers, or damage patina. May soften plastic and fiberglass. Super DeGooper Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover is non-flammable.
